Parameters.Name: 6.2.11 NVT GET NTP CONFIGURATION
Parameters.Description: TODO: - wrong response - fault with wrong namespace

Test.Name: Correct response: FromDHCP = true, several NTPFromDHCP IPv4
Test.Description: Check NVT GET NTP CONFIGURATION test when DUT return correct response (FromDHCP = true, several NTPFromDHCP IPv4).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-11 GET NTP CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get NTP information Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned NTP information STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Validate NTP information STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Fault
Test.Description: Check NVT GET NTP CONFIGURATION test when DUT return fault.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-11 GET NTP CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get NTP information Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: InvalidIPv4Address Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetNTP() in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 495 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description: Check NVT GET NTP CONFIGURATION test when DUT return no response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-11 GET NTP CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get NTP information Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault(Receiver/ActionNotSupported)
Test.Description: Check NVT GET NTP CONFIGURATION test when DUT return fault.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-11 GET NTP CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get NTP information Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetNTP() in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 495 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
